com.skyisland.questmanager.ui

Class ChatMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.ui.ChatMenu
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BioptionChatMenu, MultioptionChatMenu, SimpleChatMenu, TreeChatMenu

    public abstract class ChatMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    A menu represented in chat buttons and links

      • getDefaultMenu

        public static ChatMenu getDefaultMenu(Message message)
        Defines the menu that goes with most standard message types. If you do not register your own message types here, they will always default to simple message menus when using this command!

        It's important to note that any menus created from this command are not allowed to be provided menu actions. For example, the BioptionChatMenu that would be instantiated from a BioptionMessage would have its menu options as null, meaning no action would be executed when the options were clicked.
